name: PARTY
script: Oh there's a lot of people (...ye you've to imagine that...)
I wish I could get a drink but the dev didn't code the interaction
I'm not even able to see anybody
I've to invent glasses that allows you to see the things that they didn't code
I mean I'm already 16pixel wide, isn't that enought ?
You didn't had to put me in an empty but VERY noisy rooom
